modelSwitchDisabled: Claude Code uses its own tools and can't share chat history with other models
deleteChatHistoryDescription: This will permanently delete the chat history and remove all context from this session.
emptyState: Start a conversation with the AI agent.
inputPlaceholder: Ask the agent to do something...
undoConfirmDescription_one: This will revert {{count}} file to its previous state.
undoConfirmDescription_other: This will revert {{count}} files to their previous state.
proceedApproveAllHint: File writes will be auto-approved for this session until chat history is cleared.
creationHeading: What would you like to build?
creationSubheading: Describe your app and Awel will create it for you.
creationPlaceholder: Describe what you want to build...
creationSaasPlaceholder: e.g. Project management for remote teams, AI writing assistant...
creationAgencyPlaceholder: e.g. Brand identity design, Product photography, Motion graphics...
creationProductPlaceholder: e.g. Wireless earbuds, Artisan candles, Fitness app...
creationLocalPlaceholder: e.g. Italian trattoria, Craft coffee roaster, Ramen bar...
chooseModelFirst: Choose a model to get started.
noModelsAvailable: No models available. Configure a provider to continue.
confirmAllowAllHint: Applies for the entire session until chat history is cleared.
claudeCodeWarningDescription: Claude Code will automatically approve all file edits and shell commands without asking for your confirmation.
claudeCodeWarningWithClearDescription: Claude Code will automatically approve all file edits and shell commands without asking for your confirmation. Your current chat history will also be deleted.
claudeCodeSwitchDescription: Switching between Claude Code and other models requires clearing chat history. Your current conversation will be deleted.
styleSaasGradientDesc: Cutting-edge design with fluid gradients, purples and blues
styleSaasDarkDesc: Powerful night aesthetic with glowing accents
styleProductLuxuryDesc: Premium boutique experience with refined restraint
styleProductGlassDesc: Layered depth with frosted glass effects
styleProductBoldDesc: Energetic pop with saturated colors and dynamic shapes
styleLocalWarmDesc: Inviting warmth with natural, earthy tones
promptSaasGradient: High-conversion SaaS landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Modern Gradient. Features: Fluid liquid transitions, mesh gradients (indigo, teal, violet), translucent glass cards, and futuristic 'command center' UI. Typography: Bold, geometric sans-serif. Feel: Cutting-edge, high-depth, immersive.
promptSaasDark: Premium Dark Mode SaaS landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Mission Control. Features: Deep charcoal/obsidian backgrounds (#0a0a0a), glowing cyan accent borders, neon light-leaks, and high-contrast 'luminous' buttons. Typography: Sharp, technical monospace paired with clean sans-serif. Feel: Sophisticated, powerful, nocturnal.
promptSaasMinimal: Swiss-style Minimalist SaaS landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Mathematical Precision. Features: Rigid 12-column grid, expansive whitespace (negative space), monochrome palette with one high-chroma accent color. Typography: Heavy Helvetica-style headers, systematic hierarchy. Feel: Crisp, organized, authoritative.
promptAgencyEditorial: Editorial Portfolio landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: High-Fashion Magazine. Features: Asymmetric layouts, large-scale serif typography (hero-text), smooth parallax reveals, and oversized high-resolution imagery. Typography: Elegant Didot or Garamond headings. Feel: Curated, intentional, prestige.
promptAgencyBrutalist: Neobrutalist Agency landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Raw Rebellion. Features: Thick black borders (4px+), harsh drop shadows (neo-shadows), clashing high-saturation colors (acid yellow, hot pink), and overlapping grid elements. Typography: Brutalist block fonts, distorted headers. Feel: Bold, unapologetic, anti-design.
promptAgencyElegant: Luxury Minimal Portfolio for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Art Gallery. Features: Soft-focus transitions, micro-interactions, warm-gray and off-white palette, and extreme reductionism. Typography: Delicate, spaced-out serif. Feel: Hushed, refined, world-class.
promptProductLuxury: Luxury Product landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: High-End Boutique. Features: Cinematic product shots, gold/champagne accents, slow-motion scroll animations, and 'unboxing' feel layout. Typography: Refined, high-contrast serif. Feel: Exclusive, tactile, premium craftsmanship.
promptProductGlass: Glassmorphism Product landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Frosted Depth. Features: Multi-layered translucent panels, high backdrop-blur (30px+), thin iridescent borders, and vibrant floating spheres in background. Typography: Modern, thin sans-serif. Feel: Futuristic, lightweight, multi-dimensional.
promptProductBold: Vibrant E-commerce landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Pop-Art Energy. Features: Saturated primary colors, bouncy CSS animations, organic blob shapes, and playful floating 3D assets. Typography: Rounded, chunky display fonts. Feel: Joyful, high-energy, friendly.
promptLocalWarm: Warm Organic landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Scandinavian Hygge. Features: Earthy tones (terracotta, sage), soft rounded corners, grainy paper textures, and hand-drawn icons. Typography: Friendly, humanist sans-serif. Feel: Welcoming, artisanal, cozy.
promptLocalModern: Modern Bistro landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Contemporary Refinement. Features: Deep forest green and brass accents, editorial food photography, clean borders, and a balance of serif and sans-serif. Typography: Classic serif headers, modern UI buttons. Feel: Polished, appetizing, urban-chic.
promptLocalRustic: Rustic Artisan landing page for {{context}}. Aesthetic: Handcrafted Heritage. Features: Vintage textures, wood-grain accents, sepia-toned imagery, and letterpress effects. Typography: Custom scripts and weathered slab-serifs. Feel: Authentic, timeless, family-owned.
